web_snippets: The LA Galaxy appointed Will Kuntz as General Manager on December 5, 2023. Kuntz reports directly into Beckerman and will be responsible for soccer operations.
In his role as General Manager of the LA Galaxy, Will Kuntz is responsible for soccer operations from the first team through the academy, including scouting ...
The LA Galaxy have appointed Will Kuntz as General Manager. Announced today by Dan Beckerman, President and CEO of AEG.
